reload

public void reload()
Recreates the JTable from the calendar. This locks the Simulation, to prevent calendar from simultaneous update.

getPanel

public javax.swing.JComponent getPanel()
Retrives root panel of this Subwindow. It is not necessarilly this class, for example in case that we use some ToolBars and other controls. So whenever the Subwindow component is to be added to some container, the panel return by this call should be added instead of instance of this class.

Specified by:
getPanel in interface Subwindow
Returns:
root panel of this GUI component

setInvisible

public void setInvisible(boolean invisible)
Marks this Subwindow as invisible. That means it does not have to update itsef.

Specified by:
setInvisible in interface Subwindow
Parameters:
invisible - true iff this Subwindow is not currently on the screen.

isInvisible

public boolean isInvisible()
Is this Subwindow invisible?

Specified by:
isInvisible in interface Subwindow
Returns:
true iff this Subwindow is not currently on the screen.

revalidateSubwindow

public boolean revalidateSubwindow()
Forces the Subwindow to revalidate its contents. This is called when major parts of current simulation were changed (e.g. after a load).

Specified by:
revalidateSubwindow in interface Subwindow
Returns:
true iff the subwindow should be closed, since its contents are not valid any more.
